metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12515 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: There is an out-of-bounds read vulnerability in the functionFlateStream::getChar() located at Stream.cc in Xpdf 4.01.01. It can, forexample, be triggered by sending a crafted PDF document to the pdftoppmtool. It might allow an attacker to cause Information Disclosure or adenial of service.

criterions.comment: xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
